Destroy target monocolored permanent.
Reconstruct {4}{B}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
You can only sacrifice permanents that share a color with No Good Deed Goes Unpunished to pay its reconstruct cost.
